# RFC Template

Status: Draft | Review | Accepted | Rejected • Date: YYYY-MM-DD

## TL;DR
- Кратко опишите проблему, предлагаемое решение и ключевые эффекты.
- Добавьте 2–3 буллета с основными аргументами.

## Title
- A concise title for the proposed change.

## Summary
- Brief overview of the problem and the proposed solution.

## Motivation
- Why do we need this change? Who benefits and how?

## Detailed Design
- API/Contracts changes
- Data model changes
- Flow diagrams / sequence diagrams
- Backwards compatibility and migration plan

## Risks and Mitigations
- List key risks and how to mitigate them.

## Alternatives Considered
- Outline alternatives and trade-offs.

## Rollout Plan
- Feature flags
- Staged rollout / canary
- Monitoring and rollback strategy

## Unresolved Questions
- Items to be clarified before acceptance.
